text: “Ngati awirinu mulapa kwa Allah pazimene mwachita (chitani changu kulapa) chifukwa chakuti mitima yanu yapotoka pang’ono (chifukwa cha nsanje pa zimene Mneneri akufuna zosunga chinsinsi Chake); koma ngati awirinu muthandizana pazimene zingamvutitse, ndithu Allah ndiye Mtetezi wake ndi Jibril (Gabriele) ndiponso okhulupirira abwino; naonso angelo, kuonjezera apa ndiathandizi (ake)
